sentences.sentence: You can prepare glutinous rice flour in a bowl and slowly add hot water until they mix into a dough.
sentences.translation: 首先在碗内准备一些糯米粉，然后慢慢地加入热水，直到二者混为一个面团。

sentences.sentence: Eating yuanxiao (sweet dumplings made of glutinous rice flour) is one of the special traditions of the Lantern Festival.
sentences.translation: 吃元宵（用糯米粉制成的甜汤圆）是元宵节特别传统之一。

sentences.sentence: Sweet dumpling is small dumpling balls made of glutinous rice flour with rose petals, sesame, walnut meat, dried fruit, sugar.
sentences.translation: 汤圆是用糯米粉做皮，由玫瑰花瓣、芝麻、豆酱、枣泥、胡桃肉、干果、糖和食用油做馅，做成的小面球团。
